name: screen-cleaner

effect.scarlet-violet: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.
effect.the-teal-mask: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.
effect.the-indigo-disk: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.

short_effect: Nullifies effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.
